title: StarshipDoge
author: StarshipDoge
content: StarshipDoge is the next Shiba Inu! It's still very early! Marketcap 20k! The contract is renounced and the liquidity is locked for 100 years! Additionally, StarshipDoge is a deflatonist. 3% of each transaction is automatically burned! Don't miss the train!CA: 0x67e4cfd91e4baa4a6794c7974fec892247b26d3c Coinmarkercap link: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/starship-doge/Telegram: https://t.me/starshipdogegroupTwitter: https://twitter.com/starshipdoge_ofPancakeSwap: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x67e4CFD91E4bAa4A6794c7974FeC892247B26D3CWebsite: https://tokenstarship.com/

comments.author: Step_By_Step
comments.body: I hope you are open to honest feedback: The top of your website looks like the ones I used to try to make and never launched. I would think it looked good, then months later, well, not so sure. Also does the world really need "the next Shiba Inu?" Good luck with your project.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: Step_By_Step on August 25, 2023, 11:04:48 AM-snip-It's more like 5th kids' grade website ~XDThe information are copy-paste from the other project example:QuoteStarship Doge is a token on the Binance Smart Chain that never stops growing through TRUE deflationary techniques and further income generation for its ecosystem.QuoteAbout Shinjiru Inu V2. Shinjiru Inu is a token on the Binance Smart Chain that never stops growing through TRUE deflationary techniques and further income generation for its ecosystemEat your shitty project @OP, and stop promoting your scam project. Beware folks, one you should learn never interaction with meme-token if you don't want to lose something of your money.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Don't want to be on the same train with you. LolIn the end StarshipDoge will end up being a scam, wouldn't advise anyone to buy this shitcoin they came here then left and the coin memes are on the BSC network mostly junk.Quote from: ryzaadit on August 25, 2023, 02:51:11 PMThe information are copy-paste from the other project example:Hahaha I already suspect that the website is also copying from other projects they have no idea at all but can only copy to deceive many people, once again avoid unclear projects let alone coin memes that keep copying other big memes.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Next what? I don't think that there will ever be the next next thing that's always being said by new projects. If you guys are sincere and true to your projects.Don't let it be compared and stick to the attachment that it should be the next big thing compared to the existing ones. But whether you do it, if it seems to be the typical meme coin.I don't think that there's a little bit of chance that it will succeed, hopefully I'm wrong!

comments.author: Victorik
comments.body: Why do you want to be the next shiba? I am pretty sure this might end being a scam. Definitely going to be a pump and dumps project. Well, an advice that love taking risk, kindly invest something you can always look away from. NFA tho

comments.author: tsaroz
comments.body: Good luck with that. Noone can rule out about any coins for whether it would be another next big thing or not. But for a coin to achieve this success, it should satisfy most of the conditions to make it rise. A large part of is the genuine participation of individuals and a strategy to constantly make it to the news. Only the tag meme won't be able make a coin hit, meme coins should also bring something new, unique and interactive to keep it's users engaged.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: StarshipDoge on August 25, 2023, 10:48:59 AMStarshipDoge is the next Shiba Inu! It's still very early! Marketcap 20k! The contract is renounced and the liquidity is locked for 100 years! Additionally, StarshipDoge is a deflatonist. 3% of each transaction is automatically burned! Don't miss the train!After seeing all the links you've shared on this topic, I think it's also not bad to never be a crypto project developer. Building a project is not easy, so if you are not ready for everything, you better never build it guys. See how people here think about your project, some say that the website your project has is a website that can be made by kid, I have to say yes about that too.There's nothing exciting about your project, and if you're asking me to be on a train with you, I'd rather skip that train and wait for it to crash and I'll be the one to see it.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: 100% dead at arrival this will be the worst investment choice, I don't know why some of these scam project put every shit to our faces thinking we all are that dumb not to know and see the various red flag with their projects, how can a project go straight up to say next, next of what exactly, this is another scam shit coin being promoted here, no one should fall victim to this scam.I can see that the thread starter made a few attempts to explain or try to convince us into believing that the project has any little potential, but from the evidence of all presented this coin is another shitcoin and no one should risk any amount on it.

comments.author: Ki kos
comments.body: Good luck to you.I know this coin will be big but no one can deny this coin. However, most conditions must be met to achieve this success.Not only will tag memes be able to hit a coin, but meme coins must bring something new interactive to engage users.

comments.body: Another memecoins, among the thousands that already exist, yay. Can't even imagine why would I want to buy it, no offense.

comments.body: StarshipDoge is not the next Shiba Inu. StarshipDoge is another useless shitcoin that tries to repeat the success of Shiba Inu, so it parasitizes on its success. In reality, neither this StarshipDoge nor the other shitcoins that newbie is talking about will ever repeat the success of the famous memcoins. Famous memcoins need no introduction from newbie. This coin is not worth a single dime or a second of your time.

comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: Meme coin 101: Use either one of these words in your project and it's going to be huge in no time: Elon, Musk, Doge, Inu.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: PIMPdev on September 29, 2023, 02:05:05 PMAnother memecoins, among the thousands that already exist, yay. Can't even imagine why would I want to buy it, no offense.The same thoughts that everyone is saying. This isn't new for the new coming meme coins. While they're launching, they're thinking of building their project to defeat the other existing ones. But, they're not focusing on what they can really offer to investors although it's all known that they're just meme coins and there's no use case for most of them.This will keep happening in the future when a new greater project emerges, they'll make new projects and their only focus is to be the "next" better project that are existing on that niche of projects, whether meme coins, Ai coins, others, etc.

comments.body: last transaction 27 days ago and its self proclaiming to be the next shiba inu this kind of thing honestly always baffles me, how can a dead meme coin proclaim to be the next shiba inu while the coin itself is a dead coin.you definitely not hoping the market capitalization to magically become billions aren't you.moreover we aren't lacking these meme coins that claims to be the next shiba inu.quite literally every time there's coin with shiba or doge name in their coin, they will always claim to be next shiba inu which they definitely aren'ttherefore its bullshit claim.

comments.body: Sounds strange, I don't trust Shiba for a long time, because it's better to go down to earth and look at more real tokens like ADA or TFS, where growth is much more stable and you are sure to have a green portfolio next year.

The contract is renounced and the liquidity is locked for 100 years!You're dreaming $2k in a 24-hour transactions and a liquidity score of 211 this meme coin is going down the drain, this is another meme coin that tried to duplicate Doge and Shinba Inu's success but unfortunately, these meme coins are pump-and-dump coins there are a slow down of Dogecoin like meme coins because a new meme trend just come, which is the Pepe trend.Next year this StarshipDoge will be out of the market once the Dogecoin meme is over and it will be over next year.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: Yeah now we gotta learn that there should be no A-Doge, b-Doge….. z-Doge whatsoever. All of them going to come as surprise to the world if they ever build something good out of it. It’s gonna be fake project and I apologies if I am being very honest with the bitter truth here. Even Shiba inu is as equal to a scam project as there are thousands of them out there. These type of projects has really become way to make quick money for the owners and do nothing in terms of development. Ask yourself one very genuine question: what type of utility this project will ever host? Do you really think we now need more crappy meme coins if they have no real use case except being a joke themselves? I think better stay away with duplicates. If there is urge to invest anyways then better invest in the real DOGE. At least it will keep you safe.
